name: Drizit and Klunk
description:
Two very distinct creatures team up in order to escape from a perplexing prison in this 2D Puzzle Platformer! Will Drizit & Klunk master true teamwork by discovering unique ways to help each other? Win or Lose, their fates are Joined Together!

NOTE: Please play at 1920 x 1080 resolution. The UI seems to not scale even though it's set to scaling.
